article: How to Impress a Girl with Words
intro: Eager to impress a girl with words and make her fall in love with you? Maybe she’s

points.name: "Spending time with you is my favorite part of the day."

steps.title: Say she comes first and she'll be proud to be on the top of your list.
steps.subtitle: If a girl is going to commit, then she needs to know she’s a priority. Talk about how much quality time matters to you and how you genuinely look forward to seeing her. When she knows she offers something no one else can give you, she’ll feel like a prize you won’t give up.
sub-points: “Our conversations are my favorites. I lose myself in them!”
“Is it Saturday yet? I need to see my favorite person again!”
“You’re my absolute favorite. 🤩”

steps.title: Say she comes first and she'll be proud to be on the top of your list.
steps.subtitle: If a girl is going to commit, then she needs to know she’s a priority. Talk about how much quality time matters to you and how you genuinely look forward to seeing her. When she knows she offers something no one else can give you, she’ll feel like a prize you won’t give up.
sub-points: “Our conversations are my favorites. I lose myself in them!”
“Is it Saturday yet? I need to see my favorite person again!”
“You’re my absolute favorite. 🤩”

steps.title: Say she comes first and she'll be proud to be on the top of your list.
steps.subtitle: If a girl is going to commit, then she needs to know she’s a priority. Talk about how much quality time matters to you and how you genuinely look forward to seeing her. When she knows she offers something no one else can give you, she’ll feel like a prize you won’t give up.
sub-points: “Our conversations are my favorites. I lose myself in them!”
“Is it Saturday yet? I need to see my favorite person again!”
“You’re my absolute favorite. 🤩”

steps.title: Confess that she captivates you and she’ll feel magical.
steps.subtitle: To make her feel larger than life, talk about how she gives you that “spark” that makes your romance feel like a total fantasy. Tease her with  about how you wonder if she’s real or if she’s put a spell on you. When you say she’s “ravishing,” she’ll get the sense she’s a total enchantress.
sub-points: “You enchant me every time you look at me. You’re ravishing.”
“You’re so ravishing it’s as if you cast a spell on me! 🌠”
“Your outfit is simply ravishing. I’ll never forget it!”

steps.title: Confess that she captivates you and she’ll feel magical.
steps.subtitle: To make her feel larger than life, talk about how she gives you that “spark” that makes your romance feel like a total fantasy. Tease her with  about how you wonder if she’s real or if she’s put a spell on you. When you say she’s “ravishing,” she’ll get the sense she’s a total enchantress.
sub-points: “You enchant me every time you look at me. You’re ravishing.”
“You’re so ravishing it’s as if you cast a spell on me! 🌠”
“Your outfit is simply ravishing. I’ll never forget it!”

points.name: “My heart stopped when you walked in. You’re stunning.”

steps.title: Admit she stops you in your tracks—she’ll feel powerful and attractive.
steps.subtitle: Every girl wants to feel that she has a strong effect on the guy she likes. If you let her know that you lose your mind because she’s so unforgettable, she’ll believe that she’ll have a hold over you for good. Say that all she has to do is talk to you and you’ll be in the palm of her hand.
sub-points: “When we met, I knew you were the most stunning woman I’d ever seen.”
“You’re so stunning that you take my breath away.”
“Your eyes are seriously stunning. 😮 I don’t think I’ve ever seen that color before!”

steps.title: Admit she stops you in your tracks—she’ll feel powerful and attractive.
steps.subtitle: Every girl wants to feel that she has a strong effect on the guy she likes. If you let her know that you lose your mind because she’s so unforgettable, she’ll believe that she’ll have a hold over you for good. Say that all she has to do is talk to you and you’ll be in the palm of her hand.
sub-points: “When we met, I knew you were the most stunning woman I’d ever seen.”
“You’re so stunning that you take my breath away.”
“Your eyes are seriously stunning. 😮 I don’t think I’ve ever seen that color before!”

steps.title: Admit she stops you in your tracks—she’ll feel powerful and attractive.
steps.subtitle: Every girl wants to feel that she has a strong effect on the guy she likes. If you let her know that you lose your mind because she’s so unforgettable, she’ll believe that she’ll have a hold over you for good. Say that all she has to do is talk to you and you’ll be in the palm of her hand.
sub-points: “When we met, I knew you were the most stunning woman I’d ever seen.”
“You’re so stunning that you take my breath away.”
“Your eyes are seriously stunning. 😮 I don’t think I’ve ever seen that color before!”

steps.title: Say  shines through and she’ll feel you truly “see” her.
steps.subtitle: When you talk about inner beauty, she’ll see that you’re looking for a woman with strong values. She’ll also know you want to settle down with someone you respect. To show you honor her, discuss her principles, such as remembering to always stay kind or optimistic.
sub-points: “You’re such a beautiful person—so caring and compassionate.”
“Your values really make you shine. ✨ You’re a beautiful spirit.”
“You’re beautiful in every single way."

steps.title: Say  shines through and she’ll feel you truly “see” her.
steps.subtitle: When you talk about inner beauty, she’ll see that you’re looking for a woman with strong values. She’ll also know you want to settle down with someone you respect. To show you honor her, discuss her principles, such as remembering to always stay kind or optimistic.

steps.title: Say  shines through and she’ll feel you truly “see” her.
steps.subtitle: When you talk about inner beauty, she’ll see that you’re looking for a woman with strong values. She’ll also know you want to settle down with someone you respect. To show you honor her, discuss her principles, such as remembering to always stay kind or optimistic.
sub-points: “You’re such a beautiful person—so caring and compassionate.”
“Your values really make you shine. ✨ You’re a beautiful spirit.”
“You’re beautiful in every single way."

steps.title: Celebrate both her mind and her looks so she feels worshiped.
steps.subtitle: In order for her to feel like you’re a serious partner, she’ll need to know you value more than just her appearance. Bring up that you’re also amazed by her intelligence and she’ll be smitten.
sub-points: “Your mind is amazing to me. You’re so intelligent and insightful.”
“You’re the most amazing find—beauty and brains! 💃🏿 🧠”
“You’re as wise as you are gorgeous. You’re simply amazing.”

steps.title: Celebrate both her mind and her looks so she feels worshiped.

sub-points: “Your mind is amazing to me. You’re so intelligent and insightful.”

points.name: “You’ve got me hooked. You’re so fascinating.”

steps.title: Say you always find her interesting and she’ll adore that she thrills you.
steps.subtitle: Life partners need deep discussions to experience emotional and intellectual compatibility. If she thinks you’ll always want to hear what she has to say, she’ll glow knowing she's a great conversationalist. What's more—she'll get super attached to you.
sub-points: ”You’re anything but boring. The best way to describe you is… fascinating!”
“I live for all your stories! They’re so fascinating.”
“It’s unreal how fascinating you are. 😵‍💫 💖”

steps.title: Say you always find her interesting and she’ll adore that she thrills you.
steps.subtitle: Life partners need deep discussions to experience emotional and intellectual compatibility. If she thinks you’ll always want to hear what she has to say, she’ll glow knowing she's a great conversationalist. What's more—she'll get super attached to you.
sub-points: ”You’re anything but boring. The best way to describe you is… fascinating!”
“I live for all your stories! They’re so fascinating.”
“It’s unreal how fascinating you are. 😵‍💫 💖”

“I live for all your stories! They’re so fascinating.”
“It’s unreal how fascinating you are. 😵‍💫 💖”

steps.title: Say she motivates and fires you up so she feels really capable.
steps.subtitle: For a relationship to stand the test of time, you’ll need to uplift each other. When you pinpoint healthy traits of hers that help her evolve and improve herself, she’ll know you’ll both root for each other. She’ll also enjoy being a positive influence and the person you look up to.
sub-points: “You’re so effortlessly creative. 🎨 It’s incredibly inspiring.”
“You’re always inspiring me to be a better person.”
“I can’t believe how hard you work. You’re my inspiration."

steps.title: Say she motivates and fires you up so she feels really capable.
steps.subtitle: For a relationship to stand the test of time, you’ll need to uplift each other. When you pinpoint healthy traits of hers that help her evolve and improve herself, she’ll know you’ll both root for each other. She’ll also enjoy being a positive influence and the person you look up to.

points.name: “You always make me smile. I adore everything about you.”

steps.title: Embrace every single part of her and she’ll feel fully appreciated.
steps.subtitle: Let her know she doesn’t actually have imperfections—in your eyes, she’s flawless. When she feels like there’s nothing to hide about herself, she’ll want to stay in your life and grow by your side.
sub-points: “You always make me smile. I adore everything about you.”
“Everything you do lights me up. 💡”
“You’re my everything.”

steps.title: Embrace every single part of her and she’ll feel fully appreciated.
steps.subtitle: Let her know she doesn’t actually have imperfections—in your eyes, she’s flawless. When she feels like there’s nothing to hide about herself, she’ll want to stay in your life and grow by your side.

steps.title: Embrace every single part of her and she’ll feel fully appreciated.

sub-points: “You always make me smile. I adore everything about you.”
“Everything you do lights me up. 💡”
“You’re my everything.”

steps.title: Say you cherish her and she’ll know she’s a one-of-a-kind gift.
steps.subtitle: Make it clear that you’re invested in her and never want to give her up. Also focus on how valuable you find your relationship and how it can’t be replicated. She’ll sense your sincerity right away and feel like you'll always protect her.
sub-points: “I have something to tell you—you’re an irreplaceable treasure. 💎”
“I treasure what we’ve built together.”
"I promise I'll always treasure you.”

steps.title: Say you cherish her and she’ll know she’s a one-of-a-kind gift.
steps.subtitle: Make it clear that you’re invested in her and never want to give her up. Also focus on how valuable you find your relationship and how it can’t be replicated. She’ll sense your sincerity right away and feel like you'll always protect her.
sub-points: “I have something to tell you—you’re an irreplaceable treasure. 💎”
“I treasure what we’ve built together.”
"I promise I'll always treasure you.”

steps.title: Say you cherish her and she’ll know she’s a one-of-a-kind gift.

sub-points: “I have something to tell you—you’re an irreplaceable treasure. 💎”
“I treasure what we’ve built together.”
"I promise I'll always treasure you.”

points.name: "My heart skips a beat when I look at you."

steps.title: Speak vulnerably and she’ll know you’re deeply connected to her.
steps.subtitle: Let down your walls and she’ll believe she can see the real “you.” Since a girl looks for a bond that goes beyond impressive first dates, talk straight from the heart. Your sweet and unfiltered honesty will .
sub-points: “You make my heart melt every time I look at you.”
“My heart races every time you speak.”
“You have my whole heart. 🤗 ❤️”

points.name: “You are the most special person in my life.”

steps.title: Reassure her by telling her she’s unique and irreplaceable.
steps.subtitle: Let her know she’s always on your mind—when you express a lot of interest in a girl, you build a lasting attraction. Talk about how she’s unlike anyone you’ve ever met. When you share how remarkable she is, you prove she'll be an ongoing part of your life and that you’ll treat her right.
sub-points: “You're so special that I could never dream of letting you go."
“What we share is so special to me. 😊”
“You’re my special someone.”

steps.title: Reassure her by telling her she’s unique and irreplaceable.

“What we share is so special to me. 😊”
“You’re my special someone.”

points.name: “You fill me with so much joy.”

steps.title: Gush about happiness and she’ll know that she’s your pick-me-up.
steps.subtitle: True love activates “euphoria,” a state of extreme bliss, in the brain. If she gets the sense that she always makes you smile, then she’ll feel you two are the best match possible.
sub-points: “Being with you is a total rush. 💓 I feel a spark of joy every single day.”
“Words can’t even express how much joy you give me.”
“You’re the joy of my life.”

steps.title: Gush about happiness and she’ll know that she’s your pick-me-up.

steps.title: This powerful phrase will get her dreaming of a lasting romance.
steps.subtitle: First, think about what “love” means to you. For some inspiration, you can read up on some poetry, watch a rom-com, or make a list of your feelings for her. Then,  and open. Whether you’re smitten by a crush or totally devoted—tell her. Your swoon-worthy words will make sure she won't get you out of her head.
sub-points: “There’s no denying it—you’re the loveliest woman I’ve ever met.”
“Just when I think I couldn’t love you more, I fall for you all over again! 😍”
“I'm overwhelmed with love for you."

“I'm overwhelmed with love for you."

points.name: “This feels like fate. You must be my soulmate!”

steps.title: Discuss destiny—you’ll dazzle her with the possibilities in store for her.
steps.subtitle: If she wants eternal love, “soulmate” is one of the most important words she’ll ever hear. Use it when you’re completely serious about her and truly believe you’ve found “the one.” When you announce you’re ready to take things to the next level, you'll make her .
sub-points: “We're so honest with each other. I really believe you’re my soulmate.”
“I truly want a future with you. I see you as my soulmate.”
“I know I’ve found my soulmate. 😌”
“We're so honest with each other. I really believe you’re my soulmate.”
“I truly want a future with you. I see you as my soulmate.”
“I know I’ve found my soulmate. 😌”

steps.title: Discuss destiny—you’ll dazzle her with the possibilities in store for her.
steps.subtitle: If she wants eternal love, “soulmate” is one of the most important words she’ll ever hear. Use it when you’re completely serious about her and truly believe you’ve found “the one.” When you announce you’re ready to take things to the next level, you'll make her .
sub-points: “We're so honest with each other. I really believe you’re my soulmate.”
“I truly want a future with you. I see you as my soulmate.”
“I know I’ve found my soulmate. 😌”
